title: Ep. 221: Tracee Ellis Ross on the Power of Authentic Beauty
itunes:title: Ep. 221: Tracee Ellis Ross on the Power of Authentic Beauty
itunes:subtitle: Award-winning actor Tracee Ellis Ross, founder of the haircare line Pattern, gets candid about everything: her hair, your hair, customer reviews, ageism in Hollywood, experiments with DIY waxing, her love of Funyuns ...
description:
Award-winning actor Tracee Ellis Ross, founder of the haircare line Pattern, gets candid about everything: her hair, your hair, customer reviews, ageism in Hollywood, experiments with DIY waxing, her love of Funyuns and red lipstick, her hatred of flaky hair gels, and her love/hate of home workouts. Plus, she shares behind-the-scenes secrets from Black•ish, Mixed•ish, and her new movie, The High Note. If you want to bring joy to your beauty routine and learn how to celebrate yourself authentically, this conversation is a must-listen. -- Want more Fat Mascara? Take our listener survey: fatmascara.com/survey; Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
